comments.body: Was there a specific need to change the version number?

This change avoids lint error. Lint rules do not allow patch version and "v" letter.

```
ERROR: 1:25   dt-header   Error parsing header. Expected: foo MAJOR.MINOR (patch version not allowed)
ERROR: 1:25   dt-header   Error parsing header. Expected: foo MAJOR.MINOR ('v' not allowed)
```
